query:
SELECT  proceso, 'TOTAL' equipo,qty, pass, fail,  Round(pass/qty*100,2)  YIELD
FROM
(
SELECT proceso, Count(pass_fail) Qty, Count(pass) PASS,Count(fail)Fail
FROM
(
SELECT SERIAL_NUM,PASS_FAIL, STEP_NAME proceso,
CASE WHEN PASS_FAIL ='P' THEN 'pass'
ELSE NULL
END pass,
CASE WHEN PASS_FAIL='F' THEN 'fail'
ELSE NULL
END fail ,
SYSTEM_ID EQUIPO,STEP_NAME
FROM PIC_OSA_PD_ASM
WHERE process_date >= To_Date
('2015-07-08 06:30:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND process_date <= To_Date
('2015-07-08 15:00:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
)
GROUP BY proceso HAVING COUNT(*) > 0 )
UNION all
SELECT  proceso,equipo, qty, pass, fail,  Round(pass/qty*100,2)  YIELD
FROM
(SELECT EQUIPO,proceso, Count(pass_fail) Qty, Count(pass) PASS,Count(fail)Fail
FROM
(
SELECT SERIAL_NUM,PASS_FAIL, STEP_NAME proceso,
CASE WHEN PASS_FAIL ='P' THEN 'pass'
ELSE NULL
END pass,
CASE WHEN PASS_FAIL='F' THEN 'fail'
ELSE NULL
END fail ,
SYSTEM_ID EQUIPO,STEP_NAME
FROM PIC_OSA_PD_ASM
WHERE process_date >= To_Date
('2015-07-08 06:30:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND process_date <= To_Date
('2015-07-08 15:00:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
)
GROUP BY EQUIPO, PROCESO HAVING COUNT(*) > 0 )
ORDER BY proceso,equipo
